snippet: Former President George W. Bush is presenting “The 4% Solution,” a collection of proposals by experts, in a rare post-term contribution to the political dialogue.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush is presenting book The 4% Solution, a collection of economic proposals by experts, in a rare post-term contribution to the political dialogue; it is the next step in a gradual return to the public stage; he wrote the foreword to the book.
lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush is presenting “The 4% Solution,” a collection of proposals by experts, in a rare post-term contribution to the political dialogue.

headline.seo: Bush Presenting Book of Economic Proposals
headline.main: Enlisting Economists, Bush Adds Book to Fiscal Debate
headline.print_headline: With Book By Experts, Bush Joins Fiscal Fray
